properties.areaDesc: Pamlico and Pungo Rivers; Neuse and Bay Rivers
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 6 at 3:37PM EST until January 8 at 2:00AM EST by NWS Newport/Morehead City NC
properties.description:
...QUICK MOVING STORM SYSTEM TO BRING GALES TO COASTAL WATERS
TUESDAY AFTERNOON AND TUESDAY NIGHT...

.Winds will increase quickly late Tuesday morning and afternoon
with Gale Force conditions expected by mid afternoon. SW winds
around 25 to 35 knots, with gusts 40 to 45 knots expected ahead
of the cold front, and then will turn to the west-northwest
behind the front early Tuesday night. Seas will build to 6 to 10
feet by Tuesday evening. Conditions gradually improve Wednesday.

* WHAT...Southwest winds 10 to 20 kt with gusts up to 30 kt,
becoming west Tuesday evening, and choppy waters expected.

* WHERE...Pamlico, Pungo, Neuse, and Bay Rivers.

* WHEN...From 5 PM Tuesday to 2 AM EST Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM TUESDAY TO 2 AM EST WEDNESDAY
